storyInfo: Gerald says goodbye to old friends. The sermon bell has been struck, but it is then that the ominous peal of a firearm rings out.

attributes.content: Gerald, are you coming to ring the bell with me or something?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Is that weird?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It is. I asked you once before to help me ring the bell, and you were having none of it. You ended up sending Raimund instead.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I guess that did happen.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I thought you didn't like the sound.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Can't say either way. After all these years.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: After all these years, you still haven't gotten used to it.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You'll have to forgive me. That sound doesn't carry good memories.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Clément... do you still remember Eileen?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Eileen...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: How could I forget? If the two of you hadn't saved me back then, the bandits would've thrown me down the canyon long ago.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Haha, she was the one who insisted on saving you. I didn't want to stick my neck out.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You're not supposed to say that to my face.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Hahaha! Sorry, sorry.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: We set up camp last night. Didn't get the greatest haul, and it wasn't easy to handle either.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Raimund bled his game while I lit the fire. I was watching that tiny flame gradually sputtered to life, and I don't know what came over me, but I suddenly started thinking of Eileen.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Gerald...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: To be honest, I hadn't thought of her for the longest time. It was only when she came to mind that I realized...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I can't even remember her face.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: She was always a bit of an outcast among us. She once told me that seeing the flowers all over the monastery and hearing the sound of the bell would set her heart at ease.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: There aren't many flowers to look at these days.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Sadly true.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Eileen loved the sound of the bell here. Up until the day she left us, when she insisted on waiting until the bell rang to close her eyes.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: So that's why you don't like it.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Maybe I'm just afraid... Afraid it'll be a harbinger of bad news.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: If only we had enough medicine back then, her injuries might not have taken a turn for the worse, and it might not have come to that...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: There are no ifs.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I hope she finds salvation.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Yes, we all do.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Gerald, is it true that you've decided to leave?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I didn't think it'd be this sudden...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I should've told you earlier, but never had a chance.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's probably going to be hard on Raimund and Fortuna for a while. Those kids have always gotten along. They're not going to take it easy.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Raimund's too young. He was so little when he first came here, he doesn't remember a whole lot. He doesn't yet understand what it means to be Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But he will understand. He will come to terms with it.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Perhaps that is the Sarkaz's fate.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Fate isn't a pleasant word.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Hah, you have a point, but I can't find a better one.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Alright, I should go visit Eileen.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: We'll be walking different paths from here on out, so I guess this is where we part ways.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Wait... Gerald!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I, I'll go with you! It's only a slight detour, and won't get in the way of anything!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Oh right, look! The blooming season just started, so we can pick some flowers to give to Eileen!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'll go with you...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: No, Clément. You're confused.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm... what?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: This isn't the path meant for you. You go up those steps over there. Keep going up, the scenery is prettier from up there.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Will you get to see that beautiful scenery?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Go ring the bell, Clément. Don't waste time. That is where you belong.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Take care, brother.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: What are you talking about, Fina? This has nothing to do with Seniora Lemuen!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Liar! Who else could fix up a patron firearm for you? Only that Lateran.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Why would you think that?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: How can you tell if I'm lying or not? Fina, do you get how I'm feeling right now at all?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I really wish I could understand, Tuna, but I just don't get it anymore!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: The halo says you're telling the truth, and that your pain is no less than mine!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: But if that's true, how do you still have the heart to sit there baking pizzelle? How can you spend time around those Laterans like it's nothing?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I just don't get it, Tuna...
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Fina...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It's because... I want everyone to live their best lives.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: We don't actually have a choice, do we? Even though Avus Stefano never said it himself, and nobody talks about it with us, I've always known, deep down in my heart.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Laterano will let us back in. I overheard them saying that our monastery is actually a very powerful building, and Laterano absolutely will want us to go back.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I also know that Patruus Gerald and the others... They, they might not be able to come with us...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But I still want to try my best! If I can get the Laterans to understand that Gerald's people are all good, then maybe–
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Maybe what? They'd agree to let us all live together in Laterano?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I get it now... Is that why you're always so willing to chat with that Lemuen woman? You think you're putting in a good word for them?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Did you beg her? You think we have to get on our knees and beg for Raimund's people to not get left behind, is that it?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Fina...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You're trying to get them to change their minds. So what do you have to show for it?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I... I'm still working on them...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You're wasting your time.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Wasting it on a hope and a prayer, Tuna.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: How are we different from Raimund? Or Caroline?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Raimund can do way more than I can... and Caroline is a lot smarter than me.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: See, you get it.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: They're splitting us up. They've accepted us as their people, but at the same time, they're looking down on the ones we truly belong with.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I can't accept it. I'd rather not go to Laterano at all.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: But, Fina... Didn't we agree that one day, we'd leave the wastes and go to Laterano together?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: That we'd go live in a world without hunger or cold, a world filled with flowers rather than empty barrens as far as the eye can see?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: That's just childish dreaming, Tuna.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Do you really think so? You think it's just an empty dream?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'm not as optimistic as you are. All I know is, ever since those Laterans showed up, the air in the monastery has gotten weirder and weirder.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: It's true, our lives here have been incredibly difficult, but I've never resented that!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I love listening to Avus Stefano's sermons, and Patruus Gerald's stories about the past.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Sometimes, when we didn't have enough food, Caroline would slip us a couple extra pieces of jerky, or Amita Nina would give an extra scoop of the thickest veggie porridge to Raimund, and we'd get together and share it.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I was fine with that.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Fina...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But what about now?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Everyone always talks about how good Laterano is, but all I've ever seen of it is those people messing up our lives!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I understand you need to vent, Fina, but you can't blame Seniora Lemuen for that!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Am I venting? Okay, maybe I am.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: But, have you heard what everyone has been talking about in private? Have you noticed that Patruus Gerald and the others are coming by less and less?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: While you've been busy delivering food to Lemuen, while you've been busy making your stupid pizzelle... Do you have any idea what Caroline's people have been eating?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: You don't know anything.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: What...? Wait, Fina, what are you saying?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What's going on with Caroline? I didn't know...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Yeah. You don't know anything at all.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: It's not your fault, it's mine. If I didn't see it with my own eyes, I never would've known how bad the situation actually is.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Tuna, if through our halos, you can feel even a fraction of what I'm feeling right now–
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Then hand your patron firearm over.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Fina? What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Just hand it over.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: There's no reason for us to pray to these things.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Give it to me!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Something's wrong with you, Fina... It's too dangerous. I, I can't give it to you!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Why not? Didn't you say you'd share it with me?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I did say that, b-but, this is different!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You said you didn't get me at all, but I should be the one saying that... What's gotten into you, Fina? Wake up!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'm all too awake!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I've never been so awake! You wanna talk about prayer? About the empathy only Sankta have? I've had enough!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I don't need to be special! All I want is–
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: You can't...!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fina, don't be like this––!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Aaaaaaargh––!!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Fina...?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Urgh... Ahh! Ahhhhh!!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: All I want... is for everyone... to stay together...
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Fina? What's wrong with you? You're scaring me...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: FINA!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Yo. Finally caught up to you guys.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So, what's the word? Everything going well?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Serpilia, you need to notify us in advance if you're going to act on your own.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Don't be such a hardass, will ya? All I want is to finish the job as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: First, the good news. I found Lemuen. She's inside the monastery.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: And then the bad news— she doesn't want to come with us.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: She always has her own agenda. Couldn't get through to her at all.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Hey, don't frown at me. Go drag her out yourself, if you've got what it takes.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Huh? Alright what...? Wait, you've gotta be joking, right?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Serpilia, let me give you a little insider tip from the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Federico never cracks jokes. He isn't capable.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I will locate her myself and ascertain her thoughts.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What, do you think I'm lying to you or something?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I can't be certain that you're telling the whole truth.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Federico.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Now I understand why so many girls in the Curia have you blacklisted.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Well, whatever, let's set that aside for now. What's the situation over there? Did you manage to talk to the people?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Senior Richele...?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Is this one with you?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Yes. We're all colleagues.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What else do you want to know, young Sankta?
attributes.name: Elderly Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: We have nothing here, nothing at all... We also have nothing to say. You shouldn't have come...
attributes.name: Elderly Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Amita Nina! How could you say that? We were the ones who reached out to Laterano... You didn't have a problem with it then, did you?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: A problem? *sigh* I should've told Stefano a long time ago not to expect anything from Laterano.
attributes.name: Nina

attributes.content: Yes, yes, Julian, throw them out! We never should've let the Laterans in. We don't need their help! Get them out of here now!
attributes.name: Nina

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Calm down, Amita Nina!
attributes.name: Julian

attributes.content: What's gotten into you? Weren't you just saying you'd go welcome our guests?
attributes.name: Julian

attributes.content: Seems like the two of you need to sort some things through in private. Is there anything I can do to help?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: S-So sorry! Amita Nina here just got a bit worked up... Umm, I don't think we need any help, I just need to take her to get some rest. Come find me if there's anything you need to talk about later!
attributes.name: Julian

attributes.content: Uhh, yeah! Make sure she gets some rest!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: That was kind of odd.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Looks like things aren't going too well for you over here.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What was that about?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Things seemed fine at first, but then I have no idea what happened. Hrm.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Federico, you were the one who wanted to interrogate the residents. Did you notice anything?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: That woman's mood was unstable. While it's not unusual for a person to change their mind mid-conversation, it's rare for someone to forget the topic entirely and change their demeanor.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And so you mean...?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: ...I do have a theory.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But it's just speculation at this point. I will discuss it if the likelihood rises significantly.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Then that's that.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Besides some of the residents being kinda loopy, you must've made some other discovery?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: C'mon, Reverend Executors. Let's put our heads together.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So putting it plainly... That bishop dumped all this extra work just for the sake of the Sarkaz living here?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Didn't we mention we were willing to bring them back to Laterano? He's leaving everyone out here to starve in the cold just for those Sarkaz? He detained a Lateran nuncio just for those Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Seriously? First, that traitor Andoain leaves, and now we get this merciful, compassionate bishop?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Whew. Alright. Cool.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm not exactly into the drama, but is he out of his mind?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No wonder Lemuen couldn't agree with him... Considering what the Sarkaz did in Londinium, those Victorian dukes are probably furious.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: If word got out that His Holiness was cavorting with the Sarkaz now, his plans for the Summit of Nations would be through.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Sounds pretty serious.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Federico, if I remember correctly, the task given to Lemuen and Oren was to provide assistance and reclaim this monastery for Laterano, right?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: A good call, seeing as how this structure could serve as a fort and has a rather unique history. Definitely could come in handy.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Especially when the time comes for us to reach out to Iberia again.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: At least for now, there's no need for us to stoke conflict and burn bridges here.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: By the way, Federico, did you recognize that Sarkaz back there?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Who is he?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: A mercenary.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The average conversation between the two of you is about as interesting as 'What'd you eat last night?' 'Dinner.'
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Federico, how much do I have to pay you for a few extra words? You name the price, and I'll send the bill to His Holiness.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I have never considered this question.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Give the guy a break. Oh, right. We know now Lemuen is well, but... what about Oren?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The guy ran off a while ago. Even Lemuen doesn't know where he ended up.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But he's pretty good with the self-preservation. If you ask me... he's probably hiding somewhere, planning his next move.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Huh? Uh...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: A bell? Where's that sound coming from?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The ringing of the bell signifies the beginning of the sermon.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Should we head over? There won't be anyone in the monastery during the sermon, so we could look for Oren.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: No. I'll attend the sermon.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Woah, talk about out of character.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I need to ascertain the overall condition of this monastery to judge whether it can maintain stable function under current circumstances, or if outside intervention is needed.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Attending a sermon where a large number of residents will be present is a good observation opportunity.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I suppose it does make sense, if you put it like that. But, uhh, shouldn't you be prioritizing some more clear-cut issues? For example, Oren... Or is there something else you're worried about?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You're overthinking.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I carry out my duties in the manner I find logical.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Huh? The bell's ringing?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: That's strange... The Abbot normally doesn't preach at this time, so why's the bell ringing right now?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Oh, Clément! Talk about great timing! Do you know what's going on?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: The abbot rang the bell because he decided last-minute to deliver a sermon today.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Let's head over to the chapel.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: That's... We should go, but we haven't finished our work yet.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Why the sudden sermon though? Does it have to do with the Laterans? Are they trying to... Uhh, are they here to cause trouble?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Why would you ask that?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It's not a big deal, just tell me if it's true or not... Hey, tell me, are they not letting us go to Laterano because Gerald's people are here?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Where'd you get that idea?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It's been on everyone's mind. The Sankta and the Sarkaz are on bad terms, right? If not for that fact, we might already be back in Laterano.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Well, there's no point talking about any of that now. I just don't know how the abbot feels about all this.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Clément, just forget I ever said anything. Nobody's blaming anyone, and there's nobody to blame in the first place. It's just that... the winter's not easy. The cold's awful.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Yes, I understand.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Everyone's just thinking, if we could go to Laterano, we'd have food, clothing, and work, right?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: It'd be nice if there were some forests nearby. At least we'd be able to forage some branches to start a fire, so the kids could stay warm during the winter.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Yes, you're right... At least the kids would stay warm.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: But, would our lives really improve after we got to Laterano?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Probably? I mean, where else would we go?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: You don't need to worry yourself over that too much, Clément... God will protect us.
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: What was that sound? What's going on this time...?
attributes.name: Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: (That sound...)
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: (...a gunshot?!)
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Clément has rung the bell...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Now, I should prepare my final...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Fortuna, my child, is that you?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Punctual as ever... Please take a seat until the others arrive.
attributes.name: Abbot
Abbot
attributes.content: I still need to finish a few things...

attributes.name: Abbot
attributes.content: Fortuna?!
What's the meaning of this...?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Avus... Stefano...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Help me...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: The bloodstained girl stumbles toward the stunned old man, one step at a time.
The dim light finally illuminates the girl's face, revealing spotty traces of blood, as well as the black horns protruding from her forehead.
In front of her stands a statue of a gun-toting saint bathed in light, but behind her lies a trail of blood that cannot be erased.
Sankta blood drips onto the chapel's floorboards, giving off a dull sound. It is a deafening sound, one that opens all eyes wide.
The patron firearm used for prayer finally slips from the hands that were clutching it tightly.
Fina... Fina, she...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Don't cry, sweet child. What happened to Delfina?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: She's hurt!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It was me. I hurt her... Avus Stefano, please save her!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Father! Are you alright? What happened–
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Fortuna...? What are you doing here? Is that... blood all over you...?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What happened here?!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Huh? That's...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Woah, woah, woah. Is this for real?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: This ain't funny anymore.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You people again... What the hell is going on here?!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Why has Fortuna grown a pair of black horns?!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The executor steps into the chapel under the watchful eyes of others.
The fallen angel continues to weep, but Stefano has no choice but to turn his eyes to the visitor.
The response from her halo is showing fluctuations, and horns are growing from her head. This is a clear indication that she has fallen.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: She has broken the Commandments.
attributes.name: Federico
